CustomField.description: Conditionally show the "Initiate Termination" custom button.
CustomField.formula: IF (OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Effect"),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Amended")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Renewed")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Terminated")))),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementTerminationInitiate?id=" & Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_InitiateTermination", "Initiate Termination"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Initiate Termination
